title: Stellar Mines: Space Miner
description: Stellar Mines: Space Miner is a space mining game where you must collect resources from asteroids and sell them to get money. Buy various spaceships with different capabilities and features. Upgrade drilling equipment, extraction tools, and storage facilities to increase efficiency and increase the amount of resources you can gather from each asteroid. Build a team of skilled crew members to provide various advantages. Confront greedy pirates and bosses. Be the most powerful spaceship in the outer space.
